statements: SELECT * FROM email_suppression_list;
SELECT id, contact_email FROM email_suppression_list ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT contact_email, reason FROM email_suppression_list WHERE reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM email_suppression_list WHERE contact_email='example@example.com';
SELECT id, date_added FROM email_suppression_list WHERE DATE(date_added) = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM email_suppression_list WHERE reason = 'Spam' ORDER BY date_added DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, contact_email FROM email_suppression_list WHERE reason = 'Bounced' ORDER BY contact_email ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contact_email, reason FROM email_suppression_list WHERE date_added > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_added DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT reason FROM email_suppression_list WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY reason ASC;
SELECT contact_email, date_added FROM email_suppression_list WHERE reason <> 'Unsubscribe' ORDER BY date_added ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM email_suppression_list ORDER BY email_address DESC;
SELECT reason, email_address FROM email_suppression_list WHERE suppression_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, last_interaction FROM subscriber_activity WHERE is_subscribed = TRUE ORDER BY last_interaction DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_suppression_list WHERE reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT email_address, is_subscribed FROM subscriber_activity WHERE last_interaction > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY is_subscribed, email_address DESC;
SELECT email_address, suppression_date, reason FROM email_suppression_list WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT * FROM email_suppression_list WHERE suppression_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY suppression_date DESC
SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) AS suppression_count FROM email_suppression_list GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, last_interaction FROM subscriber_activity WHERE is_subscribed = TRUE ORDER BY last_interaction DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT email_address, reason FROM email_suppression_list UNION ALL SELECT email_address, NULL AS reason FROM subscriber_activity WHERE is_subscribed = FALSE
SELECT * FROM email_suppression_list WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email_address, added_date FROM email_suppression_list WHERE reason IS NULL;
SELECT id, email_address, added_date, reason FROM email_suppression_list WHERE added_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM suppression_reasons WHERE reason_name LIKE '%Spam%';
SELECT contact_id, subscription_status FROM contact_activity WHERE last_activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM email_suppression_list WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email_address, reason FROM email_suppression_list WHERE added_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM suppression_reasons WHERE reason_name = 'Spam';
SELECT email_address, added_date FROM email_suppression_list WHERE reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY added_date DESC;
SELECT id, email_address FROM email_suppression_list WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM email_suppression_list;
SELECT email_address, reason FROM email_suppression_list WHERE reason = 'Spam';
SELECT * FROM unsubscribed_contacts ORDER BY unsubscribe_date DESC;
SELECT email_address FROM inactive_contacts WHERE last_activity_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT reason_description FROM suppression_reasons WHERE reason_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM email_suppression_list WHERE reason='spam' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT email_address, reason FROM email_suppression_list WHERE reason='invalid_email' ORDER BY email_address ASC;
SELECT contact_id, email_address, last_activity_date FROM inactive_contacts WHERE last_activity_date < '2020-01-01';
SELECT contact_id, email_address FROM unsubscribed_contacts WHERE unsubscribe_date > '2021-06-30' AND email_address LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT email_address, reason_description FROM email_suppression_list JOIN suppression_reasons ON email_suppression_list.reason = suppression_reasons.reason_id ORDER BY email_address ASC;
SELECT email_address, reason FROM email_suppression_list
SELECT first_name, last_name, company_name FROM contact_list ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT contact_id, email_id FROM unsubscribed_contacts WHERE unsubscribed_at > '2021-06-30'
SELECT * FROM inactive_contacts WHERE inactive_since IS NOT NULL
SELECT reason_value FROM suppression_reasons
SELECT * FROM email_suppression_list;
SELECT email_id, email_address, reason FROM email_suppression_list WHERE reason IS NULL;
SELECT contact_id, first_name, last_name FROM contact_list WHERE is_active = false ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT contact_id, email_id, unsubscribed_at FROM unsubscribed_contacts WHERE unsubscribed_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY unsubscribed_at DESC;
SELECT reason_id, reason_value FROM suppression_reasons WHERE reason_value LIKE '%spam%' ORDER BY reason_id;
